snippet: A Russian peacekeeper fatally shot a young Moldovan man as he sped through a checkpoint early on New Year’s Day.
abstract: Tensions rise between Russia and Moldova after a Russian peacekeeper fatally shot young Moldovan man Vadim Pisar as he sped through a checkpoint; Russia has roughly 1,100 troops based in the Moldova's separatist enclave of Transnistria, which has large ethnic Russian and Ukrainian populations
lead_paragraph: A Russian peacekeeper fatally shot a young Moldovan man as he sped through a checkpoint early on New Year’s Day.

headline.seo: Transnistria Shooting Raises Tensions for Russia and Moldova
headline.main: Shooting at Checkpoint Raises Tensions in a Disputed Region Claimed by Moldova
headline.print_headline: Shooting at Checkpoint Raises Tensions in a Disputed Region Claimed by Moldova
